metadata.synopsis: The players are under the Psionic Suppresion of the Netherbrain as they get closer to it. The players must press on to eventually trigger the dialog with Netherbrain, starting the Mind Arena battle.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Enter END_MainTeleport To 808; -6; 1633Walk down the 'ramp' towards the brine pool

0.speaker: Player
0.text: My mind... it's being drained. Must be close...
0.context: NodeContext: Effort/strain - party can feel the Netherbrain's influence as they draw near it
